requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 4th generation / i5 2nd generation / A6 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon 5800 series / NVidia 550Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i5 3rd generation (or newer) / FX4170 (or newer)
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8000 series or newer / NVidia GTX 660 or newer
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
